ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 15 Sep 1999, Zoie wrote:
>
> Try remaping the attack key to something even more usuless, like the `/~ key
> or the + key on the VERY FAR right of the keyboard. I have found if I
> mistype I usually hit the key too far inside rather then outside, and have
> fewer deaths for poor typing.

That would require I either remove my right hand from the
mouse, or my left hand from the left side of the keyboard to
attack, both of which could get me killed. You have to strike
a balance between easy to reach and difficult to hit by
accident. Several times I've attacked something, realized I
had a guard or other blood red mob targeted, and turned off
attack before ever swinging.

--
